DOC.criteria: Women age 6590 Chemotherapy treatment earlystage ( I , IIa , IIb , IIIa ) breast cancer Postmenopausal High school education great Geographically available followup assessment Native English speaker Normal correct nearnormal hearing vision Psychiatric history include past current psychotic spectrum disorder ( schizophrenia , bipolar disorder , major depressive disorder , dementia , schizoaffective disorder ) Brain injury ( e.g. , stroke , heart attack , aneurysm , tumor , concussion , head trauma ) Brain disease History brain irradiation surgery Current past disease/disorder central nervous system medical condition affect cognitive functioning ( e.g. , chronic migraine , epilepsy history seizure , encephalitis , meningitis , multiple sclerosis , thyroid condition , Parkinson 's , Alzheimer 's , Huntington 's disease ) Active diagnosis autoimmune inflammatory disorder ( e.g. , systemic lupus erythematosus , rheumatoid arthritis , vasculitis , insulindependent diabetes , Crohn 's disease , uncontrolled allergic reaction asthma ) History cancer , except basal cell carcinoma Development second primary malignancy study Drug alcohol abuse ( i.e. , 7 drink per week ) Chronic use oral steroid medication Former ( prior earlystage breast cancer ) intrathecal therapy , radiation therapy , chemotherapy , neoadjuvant chemotherapy Acquired developmental speech , language , learn disorder ( e.g. , aphasia , dyslexia , dysgraphia , auditory processing disorder , autism , developmental delay ) Hormone replacement therapy , exclude vaginal estrogen
